Key Match Events: Wales will face Turkey on 06/09/2024, then Montenegro on 09/09/2024, and Norway will face Kazakhstan on 06/09/2024, then Austria on 09/09/2024
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Ramsey and Rubin Colwill have been included in Wales' squad for the start of their UEFA Nations League campaign.
This will mark the first international window following the appointment of former Bluebird Craig Bellamy as Wales manager.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The UEFA Nations League campaign starts for several teams.
This international window will see many young Bluebirds feature for Wales' age-grade sides.
Others: Jesper Daland has earned a call-up for Norway, having recently joined the Bluebirds from Cercle Brugge K.S.V.
Callum Robinson and Callum O'Dowda have been selected by new Republic of Ireland boss Heimir Hallgr√≠msson.
Manolis Siopis has been called up to feature for Greece.
